trans-unit.source: Uniquely identifies elements that are created and referenced as resources, and which exist within a ResourceDictionary.
trans-unit.target: Uniquely identifies elements that are created and referenced as resources, and which exist within a ResourceDictionary.

trans-unit.source: xKey attribute
trans-unit.target: xKey attribute

trans-unit.source: x:Key attribute
trans-unit.target: x:Key attribute

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Uniquely identifies elements that are created and referenced as resources, and which exist within a [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794).
trans-unit.target: Uniquely identifies elements that are created and referenced as resources, and which exist within a [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794).

trans-unit.source: XAML attribute usage
trans-unit.target: XAML attribute usage

trans-unit.source: XAML attribute usage (implicit **ResourceDictionary**)
trans-unit.target: XAML attribute usage (implicit **ResourceDictionary**)

trans-unit.source: XAML values
trans-unit.target: XAML values

trans-unit.source: Term
trans-unit.target: Term

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: object
trans-unit.target: object

trans-unit.source: Any object that is shareable.
trans-unit.target: Any object that is shareable.

trans-unit.source: See [ResourceDictionary and XAML resource references](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187273).
trans-unit.target: See [ResourceDictionary and XAML resource references](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187273).

trans-unit.source: stringKeyValue
trans-unit.target: stringKeyValue

trans-unit.source: A true string used as a key, which must conform to the _XamlName_> grammar.
trans-unit.target: A true string used as a key, which must conform to the _XamlName_> grammar.

trans-unit.source: See "XamlName grammar" below.
trans-unit.target: See "XamlName grammar" below.

trans-unit.source: XamlName grammar
trans-unit.target: XamlName grammar

trans-unit.source: The following is the normative grammar for a string that is used as a key in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) XAML implementation:
trans-unit.target: The following is the normative grammar for a string that is used as a key in the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) XAML implementation:

trans-unit.source: Characters are restricted to the lower ASCII range, and more specifically to Roman alphabet uppercase and lowercase letters, digits, and the underscore (\_) character.
trans-unit.target: Characters are restricted to the lower ASCII range, and more specifically to Roman alphabet uppercase and lowercase letters, digits, and the underscore (\_) character.

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character range is not supported.
trans-unit.target: The Unicode character range is not supported.

trans-unit.source: A name cannot begin with a digit.
trans-unit.target: A name cannot begin with a digit.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Child elements of a [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794) generally include an **x:Key** attribute that specifies a unique key value within that dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Child elements of a [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794) generally include an **x:Key** attribute that specifies a unique key value within that dictionary.

trans-unit.source: Key uniqueness is enforced at load time by the XAML processor.
trans-unit.target: Key uniqueness is enforced at load time by the XAML processor.

trans-unit.source: Non-unique **x:Key** values will result in XAML parse exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Non-unique **x:Key** values will result in XAML parse exceptions.

trans-unit.source: If requested by [{StaticResource} markup extension](staticresource-markup-extension.md), a non-resolved key will also result in XAML parse exceptions.
trans-unit.target: If requested by [{StaticResource} markup extension](staticresource-markup-extension.md), a non-resolved key will also result in XAML parse exceptions.

trans-unit.source: **x:Key** and [x:Name](x-name-attribute.md) are not identical concepts.
trans-unit.target: **x:Key** and [x:Name](x-name-attribute.md) are not identical concepts.

trans-unit.source: **x:Key** is used exclusively in resource dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: **x:Key** is used exclusively in resource dictionaries.

trans-unit.source: x:Name is used for all areas of XAML.
trans-unit.target: x:Name is used for all areas of XAML.

trans-unit.source: A [**FindName**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208715) call using a key value will not retrieve a keyed resource.
trans-unit.target: A [**FindName**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208715) call using a key value will not retrieve a keyed resource.

trans-unit.source: Note that in the implicit syntax shown, the [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794) object is implicit in how the XAML processor produces a new object to populate a [**Resources**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208740) collection.
trans-unit.target: Note that in the implicit syntax shown, the [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794) object is implicit in how the XAML processor produces a new object to populate a [**Resources**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208740) collection.

trans-unit.source: The code equivalent of specifying **x:Key** is any operation that uses a key with the underlying [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794).
trans-unit.target: The code equivalent of specifying **x:Key** is any operation that uses a key with the underlying [**ResourceDictionary**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208794).

trans-unit.source: For example, an **x:Key** applied in markup for a resource is equivalent to the value of the *key* parameter of **Insert** when you add the resource to a **ResourceDictionary**.
trans-unit.target: For example, an **x:Key** applied in markup for a resource is equivalent to the value of the *key* parameter of **Insert** when you add the resource to a **ResourceDictionary**.

trans-unit.source: An item in a resource dictionary can omit a value for **x:Key** if it is a targeted [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208849) or [**ControlTemplate**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br209391); in each of these cases the implicit key of the resource item is the **TargetType** value interpreted as a string.
trans-unit.target: An item in a resource dictionary can omit a value for **x:Key** if it is a targeted [**Style**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208849) or [**ControlTemplate**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br209391); in each of these cases the implicit key of the resource item is the **TargetType** value interpreted as a string.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Quickstart: styling controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465498) and [ResourceDictionary and XAML resource references](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187273).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Quickstart: styling controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh465498) and [ResourceDictionary and XAML resource references](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt187273).
